---
output: html_document
params:
  am: 1
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

am_mean <- mtcars %>% 
      filter(am == params$am) %>% 
      summarise(mean(mpg)) %>% 
      pull() %>%
      round(2)
am_character <- ifelse(params$am == 0, "automatic", "manual")
```

Average mileage of `r am_character` cars is `r am_mean` miles/gallon.
